Name: An fMRI dataset during a passive natural language listening task

HowToAcknowledge:
This data was obtained from the OpenfMRI database (https://openfmri.org/dataset/ds003020/). Its accession number is ds003020. 
Please cite LeBel, A., Wagner, L., Jain, S. et al. A natural language fMRI dataset for voxelwise encoding models. Sci Data 10, 555 (2023). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-023-02437-z
